name: Project Pandemic
description:
This is a small prototype in which you have to defend your world to a powerful virus.

Controls : Click on a region to see the proportion of infected people in it, the Risk of the virus spreading. Click the buttons to spend money on mesures against the virus.

You win when every region is immunised against the virus, you lose if every region is infected.

This is a smalll prototype made for a gamejam in 6 hours. It is not complete, but could be expanded upon.

This is my first game ever, feel free to review it, all constructive comments are welcome !

... I swear the theme was random.
